title: Painting, "The French Farmyard", possibly 1867
medium: Brush and oil paint on wood panel
provenance: Gift of Charles Savage Homer, Jr.
creditline: Gift of Charles Savage Homer, Jr.
description: Vertical view of a stone wall with gate through which trees are seen.  In foreground, haystack, hen and chicks, and baby in a frame mounted on wheels [minder?].

tombstone.epitaph:
Painting, "The French Farmyard", possibly 1867.
possibly 1867. Brush and oil paint on wood panel. Gift of Charles Savage Homer, Jr.. 1917-14-9.
